I've been in this "Paranormal Scientific Field" for years,Not A Ghost Hunte=
r just a Researcher,and just because you don't pick up "words-voices-senten=
ces-your name called" simply means You Are Not In Tune...Strickly just spea=
king of=C2=A0the Digital Recorder I as well as my wife get "EVPs" all the t=
ime where ever we "INVESTIGATE"=C2=A0Some Members=C2=A0we had on our TEAM d=
o not get anyting close too or even 1 single EVP.I have been close to Death=
 and seen Death Several times in my life and even worked at a "Very Old Cem=
etery" for 2 years in which I've Seen and Heard people with my own eyes and=
 ears.We DON'T=C2=A0Don't Investigate=C2=A0for FEAR we Do It for Paranormal=
 Research,to find the Truth behind Life After Death.Your Soul must be in tu=
ne (Receptive)=C2=A0with the spirit world,I get direct Answers to Questions=
 I ask sometime in full sentences.You just DON'T buy the recorder and think=
 your gonna get anything.Lights on or off if your in Tune you WILL Recieve =
you can't listen
 to a radio station clearly unless it's in tune.When used =
with 1 of FS boxes We get not only people (I say People not ghost for I hav=
e a comunicating relationship with several of Them) from our past but from =
other life (Present and What Seems Future) which after hearing back=C2=A0fr=
om recorder on=C2=A0"Audacity" are mind blowing recordings of direct respon=
ses.We've added MANY NEW Cases to our site and are working on a pilot serie=
s.Get a set of HeadPhones and listen to what we caught on Digital Recorders=
 and video..All recordings are NOT ENHANCED AT ALL,they are right off the r=
ecorder.=C2=A0 www.realinvestigationsoftheparanormal.net=C2=A0 Take a liste=
n...it takes a few mins to download evps but well worth it.
=C2=A0
Rick

Fr=
om: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>

esday, August 17, 2011 7:10 AM

=A0 
I don't have anything against that; in fact, I'd prefer to have the
li=
ghts on if there are lights. But as I mentioned, I've never gotten
anything=
 using the conventional voice recorders in my current home. I
wish I'd trie=
d it in other places I've lived before.

Zack

d <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

nter types, they seem to only want the

>>
>> I'm not in it to be scared; I'm i=
n it to hopefully learn something. I

>>
>> I have=
 tried for dozens, maybe hundreds of hours to get an EVP recording
>> at
>>=
 my home with a regular digital voice recorder. I have never gotten a peep

>> there that way. I have also tried in locations that would not be suspect=

>> of
>> being haunted, like random open country roads and fields. I never=
 got
>> anything in those either. I have gotten many EVP's in cemeteries an=
d in
>> some buildings that were supposedly haunted. This makes me think th=
at this
>> method does tap into something that is localized and exists only=
 in small
>> areas.
>>
>> I guess my house isn't one of those locations.
>>=
 :-(
>>
>> I have gotten names on EVP's a few times and in each case the na=
me could
>> be
>> associated with the location from past records (newspaper=
s, hospital
>> records, etc.) These were names of real people long dead.
>>=

>> The radio scanning boxes may tap into a different kind of entity. I don=
't
>> know. But my experiences indicate that "ghosts" do only inhabit certa=
in
>> small areas and they do not go outside those areas.
>>
>> Zack
>>
>>

 spot, record

 problems! Fro the most

nyway, there are no "portals".
